p: Water and oil absorption capacities were determined according to the method of Zhang, Yang, Tang, Chen, and You ( 2015). 2 g of samples was mixed with 20 ml distilled water or corn oil (Sigma) in 50‐ml centrifuge tubes. Each mixture was shocked for 1 min, allowed to stand for 30 min, and then centrifuged at 2,000 × g for 30 min. The results were expressed as ml of liquid retained per g of sample.
